title: 论坛的好友热度有什么用
author: zhanshen:dragon
txt_content: 查看好友时发现的'有的高有的低

replies.author: zhanshen:dragon
replies.txt_content: 顺便说一句，谁想加我好友的，请发送申请

replies.author: 819tierqusi
replies.txt_content: 就是好友最近发帖多不多

replies.author: minaction
replies.txt_content: 好友热度是可以修改的，可见那根本没有用处。

replies.author: likeliang
replies.txt_content: 热度高的说明搞♂得激烈

replies.author: zhanshen:dragon
replies.txt_content:
likeliang 发表于 2014-7-5 16:35
热度高的说明搞♂得激烈
你，是不是找撸啊

replies.author: zhanshen:dragon
replies.txt_content:
lisongnan7 发表于 2014-7-5 16:33
活跃度
知道了，不过为什么能修改

replies.author: zjr_516635864
replies.txt_content: 数值越高你距离攻略该基友越近
是好友在论坛的活跃度
